main event: Two unidentified aerial objects were sighted in Corvallis, Oregon on 6 November 1954.
interesting points: The objects were circular in shape, approximately 40 to 50 feet in diameter., The objects were silver in color and appeared to reflect sunlight., They were observed flying at a high altitude and high rate of speed., The sighting lasted for approximately 2 to 3 minutes before the objects disappeared., Multiple witnesses reported the sighting, including a civilian college professor.
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. L. M. Jones and 3 minor children
